amendment.description: To require that the comparative report on peacekeeping operations include an assessment of the operational, structural, and doctrinal differences between the military and civilian infrastructures of the United States and United Nations and other assumptions that impact cost estimates.

vote.text: Amendment SA 209 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 209 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Corker.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 209 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 209 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Corker.
